# WISH LIST

We are in the process of buying a house together and we have many things on our wish list, but it's so hard to choose in advance! Instead of a traditional registry, we would be grateful for any monetary contribution towards the below items, and we'll send you a picture of us using the item to say thank you.


<div class="row">
	<div class="span6">
		<h3>GRAVY BOAT</h3>
		<p>Nothing fancy. Something to hold gravy in. Mandatory for every newly wed couple.</p>
	</div>

	</div>
</div>
